languages.text: "Щекочущее чувство опасности, которая она распространяет — изысканная специя. Вольный Торговец знает, как придать пикантность страсти".
"The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."
languages.original_text: "Щекочущее чувство опасности, которая она распространяет — изысканная специя. Вольный Торговец знает, как придать пикантность страсти".

traits.locale_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. {name} certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

languages.text: "Das Kitzeln der Gefahr, welches sie verbreitet, ist ein exquisites Gewürz. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} weiß wirklich, wie man einer Begegnung ein wenig Schärfe verleiht."
languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

traits.locale_text: "Das Kitzeln der Gefahr, welches sie verbreitet, ist ein exquisites Gewürz. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} weiß wirklich, wie man einer Begegnung ein wenig Schärfe verleiht."

languages.text: « La piquante aura de danger qui émane de sa personne est pareille à une épice exquise. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} sait fort bien comment pimenter une rencontre en y ajoutant une pointe de frisson. »
languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

traits.locale_text: « La piquante aura de danger qui émane de sa personne est pareille à une épice exquise. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} sait fort bien comment pimenter une rencontre en y ajoutant une pointe de frisson. »

languages.text: «El cosquilleo del peligro es una especia exquisita. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente sabe cómo animar cualquier encuentro».
languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

traits.locale_text: «El cosquilleo del peligro es una especia exquisita. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente sabe cómo animar cualquier encuentro».

languages.text: 「彼女がまき散らす危機感は、絶妙なスパイスとなる。ローグトレーダーは、出会いに刺激を与える方法をよく知っているな」
languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女がまき散らす危機感は、絶妙なスパイスとなる。ローグトレーダーは、出会いに刺激を与える方法をよく知っているな」

languages.text: “她散发着令人心痒难耐的危险，这是一种相当精致的调味品。很显然，行商浪人很清楚该如何让一段感情变得更加炽热。”
languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

traits.locale_text: “她散发着令人心痒难耐的危险，这是一种相当精致的调味品。很显然，行商浪人很清楚该如何让一段感情变得更加炽热。”

languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."

languages.text: "Etrafa saçtığı tehlikeden doğan o karıncalanma hissi, muazzam bir çeşni niteliğinde. Hür Tacir, çatışmalara nasıl heyecan katacağını hakikaten biliyor."
languages.original_text: "The tickling sense of danger she spreads is an exquisite spice. The Rogue Trader certainly knows how to add a frisson of heat to an encounter."
